short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mutes chat windows and sounds on BoardGameArena.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Some days, you just don't feel like talking. When you click the icon for Mute Chat for BoardGameArena, it hides the chat on BoardGameArena.com. Click the icon again to show the chat. That's it. 

Mute Chat lets you choose whether to mute the site-wide general chat, per-game chats, or the notification sounds. By default, it gets rid of all three.

Mute Chat does not access your BGA account or track any personal information. It just hides the chat.

This extension is free to download with no ads, popups or tracking of any kind.
